p: The organ part of caraway causes changes in essential oil yield and its chemical profile. Dried ripped fruit caraway oil by hydro-distillation method consists of germacrene D (75%), caryophyllene, elemene, humulene, germacrene A and B, and two cadinenes. Germacrene B (51%) was the main component of seedlings root oil, which decreases during development [ 35].
